text: Dorothy Arlene "Claire" Dodd (December 29, 1911 â€“ November 23, 1973) was an American actress. She acted in several movies. She played secretary Della Street in The Case of the Curious Bride and The Case of the Velvet Claws. Dodd was born in central Iowa. She died from cancer in Beverly Hills, California. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Iowa Category:1911 births Category:1973 deaths
title: Claire Dodd
